title: GE Profile 30" Slide-In Double Oven Gas Range - PGS960SELSS
description:
GE Profile 30" Stainless Steel Slide-In Double Oven Gas Range - PGS960SELSS

Features:

Fit Guarantee 
Replace your old 30” free-standing range with a new 30" slide-in model. GE slide-in ranges are guaranteed for an exact fit to make replacement easy

Edge-to-edge cooktop 
A large, continuous cooking surface gives you extra room for pots and pans of all sizes and lets cookware move easily from burner to burner

21,000 BTU Multi-ring burner
Versatile burner creates intense heat perfect for searing, frying and sauteing

Extra-large integrated reversible cast iron grill/griddle
Enjoy ultimate cooking versatility. Cook up to six grilled cheeses on the industry’s largest integrated griddle, and then flip it over to grill your favorite foods.

Dual purpose center burner 
Cook your way with a round burner for steaming broccoli and an oval burner for griddling sandwiches

Wifi Connect 
Wirelessly control oven functions from your smartphone

Chef Connect 
Three options with a single touch. For instant convenience, choose when to automatically sync clocks and the range elements with the microwave's surface light and vent



Specifications:

Capacity

Total Capacity (Cu. Ft.): 6.7

Capacity (Cu. Ft.): 2.4 Upper / 4.3 Lower



General

Burner - Center: 8,000 BTU Dual Oval

Cooktop Surface: Edge-to-Edge. Deep Recessed. Stainless Steel

Oven Interior: 1 Incandescent. Black

Configuration: Double Oven Range

Cooking Technology: Traditional Upper; Convection Lower

Oven Rack Features: 1 Self-Clean Oven Rack (Upper). 2 Self-Clean Oven Racks (Lower). 6 Rack Positions

Burner - Right Front: 15,000 BTU

Burner - Left Rear: 5,000 BTU Precise Simmer

Control Location: Front controls

Griddle: Reversible Integrated Grill/Griddle (Included)

Ignition System: Electronic

Cooktop Burner Grate Material:	Heavy Cast Iron

Fuel Type:	Natural Gas (factory set)

Oven Control Features:	Audible Preheat Signal. Auto Oven Shut-Off. Certified Sabbath Mode. Control Lock Capability. Delay Bake Option. Electronic Clock & Kitchen Timer. Hi / Low Broil

Burner - Left Front: 21,000 BTU Tri-ring Burner

Cooktop Burner Type: Sealed

Cooking System: True European Convection

Control Type: Electronic

Oven Cooking Modes: Convection Bake. Convection Roast

Oven Cleaning Type: Self-Clean with Steam Clean Option

Burner - Right Rear: 9,500 BTU

WiFi Connect: Built-In

Cooktop Burner Grate Features: Continuous Grates



Filter

App Filter - Control Type: Electronic touchpad

App Filter - Fuel Type: Gas

App Filter - Cabinet Width: Cooking 30 in. (Standard)

App Filter - Tri-Ring Burner: Yes

App Filter - Edge-to-Edge Cooktop: Yes

App Filter - Cleaning Type: Steam and Self-Clean

App Filter - Cooktop Type: Continuous Grates with Griddle

App Filter - Product Type: Ranges Slide-In Single Oven

App Filter - Convection: Yes

App Filter - WiFi Connect: Built-In

App Filter - Cooking Technology: Convection



Appearance

Installation: Flush Appearance. Free-standing cut-out

Control Knobs: Stainless Steel

Oven Door Features: Big View Oven Window

Cooktop Burner Grate Color: Matte Black

Color Appearance: Stainless Steel/Black

Handle: Designer Style. Stainless Steel



Power / Ratings

Top Burner BTU Rating - Nat. Gas (000's BTU's): (1) 21.0; (1) 15.0; (1) 9.5; (1) 8.0; (1) 5.0

Bake/Broiler BTU Rating - Nat. Gas (000's BTU's): 7.0 / 120V Upper; 14.0 / 16.5 Lower

Volts/Hertz/Amps: 120v; 60Hz; 15A

Top Burner BTU Rating - LP (000's BTU's): (1) 18.0 Tri-Ring; (1) 15.0; (1) 9.5; (1) 8.0; (1) 5.0

Bake/Broiler BTU Rating - LP (000's BTU's): 7.0 / 120V - Upper; 13.5 / 14.5 - Lower

LP Conversion Kit: Included

ADA Compliant
